distribution.title: CEP token distribution
distribution.content1: CEP pursues the concept of complete decentralization, community self-governance, openness and transparency, and fair start. The distribution method of CEP governance tokens (Symbol: CEP) will also follow this concept.
distribution.content2: The total amount of CEP is 10 billion, which will be allocated according to the following proportions

mining.title: Liquidity Mining
mining.content1: CEP will also adopt liquidity mining to encourage users to join. Users can provide liquidity for CEP by purchasing the cryptocurrency ETF issued by CEP, thereby participating in liquidity mining and obtaining governance token CEP. CEP will be released in accordance with certain rules. The principle is that the more liquidity provided, the more CEP is obtained, and the faster the release.

content2.word: Compared with previous centralized exchanges, everyone's cryptocurrency assets are stored in the offline wallet of the centralized exchange. It is equivalent to placing trust on the exchange's brand. In the event of an exchange running off or a security issue, the user's assets will naturally be affected. And the current liquidity mining mechanism is equivalent to the original transaction mining mechanism through contracts. Thereby ensuring the safety of digital assets.

content3.word: Compared with the previous centralized exchanges that are mainly engaged in transaction mining, the advantage of liquid mining is that its rules are rule by code, so the rules of liquid mining cannot be easily tampered with, so each liquid mining generation The distribution mechanism of coins is written on the smart contract. The immutability of the contract makes the mining mechanism transparent and the distribution method clear. Treat everyone equally.

content4.word: The method of liquidity mining can avoid the risk of additional issuance, spam, and runaway closure of centralized exchanges. Because the transaction tokens obtained by liquidity mining can be clearly queried through the Ethereum browser. Taking the latest liquid mining project UNI Token as an example, every UNI transfer and transaction can be easily queried on the block explorer. Therefore, the interests of investors are guaranteed.

pool.word1: Using Single asset Entry, you can use ETH to mint a Pie in one transaction.
pool.word2: Single Asset Entry fetches the underlying assets for you from external markets like Uniswap, because of that slippage might apply.
pool.word3: are sent during the TX to avoid unxpected errors, any unused ETH is returned.
